question:
With reference to the structure of the Niti Aayog and the erstwhile Planning commission, consider the following statements:
1. While Niti Aayog vice-chairman has a cabinet secretary rank, the deputy chairman of planning commission had a cabinet rank
2. While full time members of Niti Aayog have a rank equivalent to minister of states, the members of planning commission had rank equivalent to secretary
Which among the above is / are correct statements?
